Detailed Description

Header file for ICMP.c.

Define Documentation

#define ICMP_TYPE_DESTINATIONUNREACHABLE   3

ICMP message type constant, indicating a packet destination is unreachable

#define ICMP_TYPE_ECHOREPLY   0

ICMP message type constant, indicating an ICMP ECHO Reply message

#define ICMP_TYPE_ECHOREQUEST   8

ICMP message type constant, indicating an ICMP ECHO Request message

#define ICMP_TYPE_REDIRECTMESSAGE   5

ICMP message type constant, indicating an ICMP Redirect message

#define ICMP_TYPE_SOURCEQUENCH   4

ICMP message type constant, indicating an ICMP Source Quench message

#define ICMP_TYPE_TIMEEXCEEDED   11

ICMP message type constant, indicating an ICMP Time Exceeded message

Function Documentation

int16_t ICMP_ProcessICMPPacket ( Ethernet_Frame_Info_t *  FrameIN,
void *  InDataStart,
void *  OutDataStart 
)

Processes an ICMP packet inside an Ethernet frame, and writes the appropriate response to the output Ethernet frame if the host is issuing a ICMP ECHO request.

Parameters:
[in] FrameIN Pointer to the incoming Ethernet frame information structure
[in] InDataStart Pointer to the start of the incoming packet's ICMP header
[out] OutDataStart Pointer to the start of the outgoing packet's ICMP header
Returns:
The number of bytes written to the out Ethernet frame if any, NO_RESPONSE otherwise
